languages.text: {n}Его голос звучит среди масок — но эхо и шум толпы запутывают следы.{/n} "В некой точке этой Вселенной. И чувствую себя куда увереннее вдали от острых штук в ваших руках, госпо{mf|дин|жа}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Его голос звучит среди масок — но эхо и шум толпы запутывают следы.{/n} "В некой точке этой Вселенной. И чувствую себя куда увереннее вдали от острых клыков вашей зверушки, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Ибо, как говорила моя бабушка, не суй куда не надо дважды. Полагаю, она имела в виду мой любопытный нос".

languages.text: {n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"
languages.original_text: {n}Его голос звучит среди масок — но эхо и шум толпы запутывают следы.{/n} "В некой точке этой Вселенной. И чувствую себя куда увереннее вдали от острых штук в ваших руках, госпо{mf|дин|жа}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}His voice is heard among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this universe. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, {mf|master|mistress}!"

{n}His voice is heard among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this universe. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, {mf|master|mistress}!"

{n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"

{n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"

languages.text: {n}你听到他的声音从无数面具中传来，但回声与人群的喧闹声让你无法辨认声音的来源。{/n}“我在这个星系的某个地方。还有，来自上界的大人，我更愿意离你手里的尖东西远点，这样感觉安全多了！”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到他的声音从无数面具中传来，但回声与人群的喧闹声让你无法辨认声音的来源。{/n}“我在这个星系的某个地方。还有，来自上界的大人，我更愿意离你手里的尖东西远点，这样感觉安全多了！”

languages.text: {n}Oyes su voz entre las máscaras, pero los ecos y el bullicio del gentío te impiden precisar el origen.{/n} «En algún lugar de esta galaxia. ¡Y me siento mucho más seguro lejos de los objetos punzantes y afilados que suele blandir Su {mf|Celestialísimo|Celestialísima}!».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes su voz entre las máscaras, pero los ecos y el bullicio del gentío te impiden precisar el origen.{/n} «En algún lugar de esta galaxia. ¡Y me siento mucho más seguro lejos de los objetos punzantes y afilados que suele blandir Su {mf|Celestialísimo|Celestialísima}!».

languages.text: {n}Sesini maskelerin arasından duysan da yankılar ve kalabalığın gürültüsü, nereden geldiğini bulmana engel oluyor.{/n} "Bu galakside bir yerlerde. Ellerindeki sivri ve keskin şeylerden uzakta kendimi çok daha güvende hissediyorum Semavi Efendimiz!"
languages.original_text: {n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesini maskelerin arasından duysan da yankılar ve kalabalığın gürültüsü, nereden geldiğini bulmana engel oluyor.{/n} "Bu galakside bir yerlerde. Ellerindeki sivri ve keskin şeylerden uzakta kendimi çok daha güvende hissediyorum Semavi Efendimiz!"

languages.text: {n}その仮面の間から彼の声が聞こえるが、群衆の残響と騒音で分からなくなる。{/n}「この宇宙のどこかで。そして、閣下、あなたの手に握られた鋭くとがったものから離れて安心しています！」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}その仮面の間から彼の声が聞こえるが、群衆の残響と騒音で分からなくなる。{/n}「この宇宙のどこかで。そして、閣下、あなたの手に握られた鋭くとがったものから離れて安心しています！」

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez sa voix s'élever de l'océan de masques, mais les échos et les bruits de la foule en brouillent l'origine exacte.{/n} « Quelque part dans cette galaxie. Et je me sens bien plus en sécurité à saine distance des pointes acérées dont vos mains sont hérissées, Votre Célestence ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez sa voix s'élever de l'océan de masques, mais les échos et les bruits de la foule en brouillent l'origine exacte.{/n} « Quelque part dans cette galaxie. Et je me sens bien plus en sécurité à saine distance des pointes acérées dont vos mains sont hérissées, Votre Célestence ! »

languages.text: {n}Du hörst seine Stimme zwischen den Masken, doch die Echos und der Lärm der Menge verschleiern die Quelle.{/n} "Irgendwo in dieser Galaxie. Und ich fühle mich sehr viel sicherer fern von den scharfen und spitzen Dingen in Euren Händen, Euer Himmlischkeit!"
languages.original_text: {n}You hear his voice among the masks, but the echoes and the noise of the crowd muddle the source.{/n} "Somewhere in this galaxy. And I feel much safer away from the sharp and pointy things in your hands, Your Celestialship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst seine Stimme zwischen den Masken, doch die Echos und der Lärm der Menge verschleiern die Quelle.{/n} "Irgendwo in dieser Galaxie. Und ich fühle mich sehr viel sicherer fern von den scharfen und spitzen Dingen in Euren Händen, Euer Himmlischkeit!"
